description: Let c be the point at which Gamma(x), x>0, is minimized; sequence gives continued fraction for c.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Gamma Function.
mathematica: ContinuedFraction[ x /. FindRoot[ Gamma'[x] == 0, {x, 1}, WorkingPrecision -> 100], 69] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Oct 29 2012 *)
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
